mapper.insert: INSERT into apply_dogiver(dog_id, dog_name, dog_age, dog_breed, dog_weight, dog_bloodType,apply_status) VALUES(DOG_ID_APPLY_DOGIVER.nextval,#{dog_name},#{dog_age},#{dog_breed},#{dog_weight},#{dog_bloodType},'신청완료')
mapper.select: select dog_name, dog_age, dog_weight, dog_breed, dog_image from apply_dogiver join dogiver on dogiver.dog_id = apply_dogiver.dog_id
